summary: An alternative Hebrew keyboard map, for ISO-8859-8 usage.
name: Israelli-hebrew-shifted
description:
A Hebrew alphabet keyboard map, according to the standart Israelli keyboard layout, on a US-ASCII keyboard, to ISO-8859-8 hebrew chars.Instade of using punctuation keys for ending(finial) letters, we use shifted keys, rendering three obvious advatages.
Also, the usage of 'reversed-insert' mode is configurable.
install_details:
better
:set noallowrevins
since we fake that in the script, then
:so <script.vim>
